## utils.dom.removeClass() function

Remove a CSS class from a element.

Handles multiple space-separated classes for legacy reasons.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function removeClass(element: Element, className: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  element | Element | DOM element to remove class from. |
|  className | string | Name of class to remove. |

**Returns:**

boolean

True if class was removed, false if never present.
